scene_description: The wide slope stretches down the snowy mountain, dotted with tracks where people have already ridden. A snowboarder in bright colors speeds across the slope, their whole body visible as they balance on the board. The scene captures both the rider and the crisp winter setting: the tall pine trees in the distance, the sparkling snow, and the open blue sky overhead.
items: A snowboarder in a red jacket and black helmet gliding down the slope
A full view of the snowboarder’s blue snowboard carving a path in the snow
Snow spraying behind the snowboarder’s board as they turn
Tall pine trees lining the slope in the background
The snow-covered mountain stretching upward behind the trees
A skier in a yellow jacket standing farther up the hill
A wooden ski lodge with a smoking chimney at the bottom of the slope
Bright sunlight casting long shadows across the snow
scene_type: long shot (shows the entire subject head-to-toe along with their surroundings)
